title: Hybrid Trailer Sound Effects
description: Now entering a subatomic superhero war zone! Introducing Hybrid Trailer! The action packed, adrenaline rising, Post apocalyptic, Tokyo city cinematic sound effects library that throws down.
longDescription:
Audio Demo

Video Demo

Use caution friend. You are now entering a sub atomic superhero war zone. Hybrid Trailer - AAA Game & Movie Trailer Sound Effects Library is the all new action packed, adrenaline spiking collection of game and movie trailer style sounds that will tip the scales to give your production an unfair advantage in the ears of your listeners. 

Packed with post apocalyptic, Tokyo city cinematic sound effects to thrill your audience, Hybrid Trailer includes futuristic heavy bass cinematics, hardcore risers and hits, earth shattering trailer impacts, sinister BRAAAMS and screechers. This wide ranging collection will outfit almost any genre game or movie trailer, and sweeten any action scene or superhero musical theme. 

Get the attention your production deserves! Hybrid Trailer

Packed with post apocalyptic, Tokyo city cinematic sound effects to thrill your audience, Hybrid Trailer includes futuristic heavy bass cinematics, hardcore risers and hits, earth shattering trailer impacts, sinister BRAAAMS and screechers. This wide ranging collection will outfit almost any genre game or movie trailer, and sweeten any action scene or superhero musical theme.

With Hybrid Trailer you’ll be ready with a complete hybrid movie trailer tool kit that instantly advances your production into the upper echelons of Hollywood production value. Over one hour of audio, 503 sound files, all in pristine 44.1k 16bit WAV format and all sounds mixed and mastered, ready to use out of the box (RTUOTB). Just drag and drop into your favorite DAW.
technicalDetails:
• 503 files
  • Over 1+ hours of audio
  • All in .WAV 96k 24bit file format
  • Game and Film Trailer Sound Effects Library
  • 100 Horn BRAAAMS of Doom, Apocalypse, Distant, Warfare, and Aggressive
  • 120 Impacts and Hits in Dark, Atmospheric, Aggressive, Metallic, Sinister, Tension themes & more
  • 80 Rise and Hits for Actions Scenes, Adrenaline Rising, Decisive Moments, Eerie, Brute Force & more
  • 83 Rises Whooshes Transitions in ambient, droning, cyber transitions, morphs, pass-bys and stutter whooshes
  • 120 Stingers and Stutters in Ghostly, Glitch, Hi-tech, Complex, and Slow

Number of Audio Waves: 503

Number of Audio Cues: 503

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 60m

Supported Development Platforms: Windows, Mac, PS4, iOS, Android, Xbox One, Oculus, SteamVR / HTC Vive, Gear VR, Linux, HTML5

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows, Mac, PS4, iOS, Android, Xbox One, Oculus, SteamVR / HTC Vive, Gear VR, Linux, HTML5

Documentation: Content List
